hero.title: Shaping Culture Through Music
hero.subtitle: Record Label & Music Publishing
hero.description: We are Rocket Science. A music industry powerhouse committed to creativity and innovation, empowering artists and songwriters to reach their full potential globally.

label.title: Rocket Science Music Group
label.description: We identify and develop the most creative and innovative emerging artists, producing and distributing music that pushes boundaries and challenges conventions. Our commitment to artistic freedom and innovation helps shape the future of music.

artistDev.title: Artist Development
artistDev.subtitle: From emerging talent to established stars

distribution.title: Global Distribution
distribution.subtitle: Physical and digital, reaching fans everywhere

publishing.title: Rocket Science Music Publishing
publishing.description: Award-winning publishing administration maximizing the value of musical compositions. We negotiate worldwide licenses, properly register with all organizations, and ensure songwriters and copyright holders receive every dollar they've earned.

launchpad.title: Introducing LAUNCHPAD
launchpad.description: Professional distribution tools for exceptional independent artists, labels, and publishers. Get your music on 100+ platforms and register compositions with PROs worldwide.

steps.title: Tailored Partnership

cta.title: Ready to elevate your career?
cta.subtitle: Join our exclusive roster of exceptional artists and music professionals.

1.title: 1. Information We Collect
1.content1: At Rocket Science Music Group & Rocket Science Music Publishing Group LLC ("we," "us," or "our"), we collect information you provide directly to us when you visit our website, submit an application, or contact us.
1.content2: The types of information we may collect include:
list: Personal information (name, email address, phone number)
Professional information (artist name, company name, role)
Content you submit (music links, social media profiles)
Communications you send to us
Usage data and analytics when you visit our website

2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
2.content: We use the information we collect to:
list: Review and respond to your applications and inquiries
Communicate with you about our services
Send you updates and marketing communications (with your consent)
Improve our website and services
Comply with legal obligations
Protect our rights and prevent fraud

3.title: 3. Information Sharing
3.content: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information only in the following circumstances:
list: With your consent or at your direction
With service providers who assist us in operating our website and conducting our business
When required by law or to respond to legal process
To protect our rights, privacy, safety, or property
In connection with a business transfer, merger, or acquisition

4.title: 4. Data Security
4.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

5.title: 5. Your Rights and Choices
5.content1: You have certain rights regarding your personal information:
list: Access and receive a copy of your personal information
Correct or update inaccurate information
Request deletion of your information (subject to legal requirements)
Opt-out of marketing communications
Withdraw consent where applicable
5.content2: To exercise these rights, please contact us using the information below.

6.title: 6. Cookies and Tracking
6.content1: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to collect information about your browsing activities on our website. Cookies are small data files stored on your device. You can control cookies through your browser settings, but disabling them may limit your ability to use certain features of our website.
6.content2: We may use analytics services like Google Analytics to help us understand how visitors use our website.

7.title: 7. Third-Party Links
7.content: Our website may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these sites. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of any third-party sites you visit.

8.title: 8. Children's Privacy
8.content: Our services are not directed to individuals under 18 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 18. If we become aware that we have collected information from a child under 18, we will take steps to delete it.

9.title: 9. International Data Transfers
9.content: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own, including the United States. These countries may have different data protection laws than your jurisdiction. By using our services, you consent to such transfers.

10.title: 10. Data Retention
10.content: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law.

11.title: 11. California Privacy Rights
11.content: California residents have additional rights under the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA), including the right to know what personal information we collect, the right to delete personal information, and the right to opt-out of the sale of personal information (which we do not do).

12.title: 12. Changes to This Policy
12.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date. Your continued use of our services after changes constitutes acceptance of the modified policy.

13.title: 13. Contact Us
13.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at:

1.title: 1. Agreement to Terms
1.content: By accessing or using the website of Rocket Science Music Group & Rocket Science Music Publishing Group LLC ("Company," "we," "us," or "our"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service ("Terms"). If you do not agree to these Terms, you may not use our website.

2.title: 2. Website Use
2.content1: Our website provides information about our music industry services, including record label operations, artist development, and music publishing administration. You may use our website for lawful purposes only.
list: Use our website in any way that violates applicable laws or regulations
Attempt to gain unauthorized access to any portion of the website
Interfere with or disrupt the website or servers
Copy, reproduce, or distribute website content without permission
Use automated systems to access the website without our consent

3.title: 3. Intellectual Property
3.content1: All content on this website, including text, graphics, logos, images, audio clips, and software, is the property of Rocket Science Music Group LLC or its content suppliers and is protected by international copyright laws. The compilation of all content on this website is our exclusive property.
3.content2: Trademarks, logos, and service marks displayed on this website are registered and unregistered trademarks of the Company or third parties. Nothing on this website should be construed as granting any license or right to use any trademark without our written permission.

4.title: 4. Application Submissions
4.content: When you submit an application through our website:
list: You represent that all information provided is accurate and complete
You grant us permission to review your submitted materials
You understand that submission does not guarantee acceptance or any business relationship
We reserve the right to decline any application at our sole discretion
We are not obligated to provide feedback on submissions

5.title: 5. Contact Information
5.content: If you provide contact information through our website, you consent to us contacting you regarding your inquiry or submission. We will handle your information according to our Privacy Policy.

6.title: 6. Disclaimers
6.noWarranties: No Warranties: This website is provided "as is" without any representations or warranties, express or implied. We make no representations or warranties regarding the accuracy or completeness of content on this website.
6.noAdvice: No Professional Advice: Information on this website is for general informational purposes only and should not be considered professional advice regarding legal, financial, or career matters.
6.externalLinks: External Links: Our website may contain links to third-party websites. We have no control over the content of these sites and assume no responsibility for them.

7.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
7.content1: TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, THE COMPANY SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES, OR ANY LOSS OF PROFITS OR REVENUES, ARISING OUT OF OR RELATED TO YOUR USE OF THE WEBSITE.
7.content2: In no event shall our total liability exceed the amount of one hundred dollars ($100).

8.title: 8. Indemnification
8.content: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless the Company, its affiliates, officers, directors, employees, and agents from any claims, damages, losses, liabilities, and expenses arising from your use of the website or violation of these Terms.

9.title: 9. Privacy
9.content: Your use of our website is also governed by our Privacy Policy. Please review our Privacy Policy, which explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.

10.title: 10. Governing Law
10.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of Florida, without regard to its conflict of law provisions. Any disputes arising from these Terms shall be resolved exclusively in the courts of Miami-Dade County, Florida.

11.title: 11. Changes to Terms
11.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. We will notify users of any material changes by posting the new Terms on this page and updating the "Last updated" date. Your continued use of the website after changes constitutes acceptance of the modified Terms.

12.title: 12. Severability
12.content: If any provision of these Terms is held to be invalid or unenforceable, the remaining provisions shall continue in full force and effect.

13.title: 13. Contact Information
13.content: For questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at:
